item.description:
We look forward to chatting over brunch. Afterwards, we will give you a tour of our Common House which includes the kid's room, living room, Great Room, kitchen, mail room, offices, rumpus room, laundry, and guest suite.

Please come directly to the Common House which is the big building you see across the interior yard when you first come in the Cornwall Street entrance. Come in through the vestibule and turn left into our Great Room. We will be there to welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Diane and Jeney will be in the Common House
item.name: Brunch at JP Cohousing
